# 光谱测量结果


```{r}
library(dplyr)
dt_Rrs <- tmp$dt$Rrs %>%
  t() %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  setNames(., as.numeric(.[1, ])) %>%
  .[-1, ] %>%
  .[, dplyr::between(colnames(.), 400, 800)]

FCMm::plot_spec_from_df(dt_Rrs) + 
  ggplot2::labs(x = "Wavelength [nm]", y = "Rrs [1/sr]")
  
```
